mainText:
Although I am happy that Steve has found peace, it is a very sad day.

I have never owned a PC and never will. My husband and I bought our first Mac in about 1989 and have owned many since. I am currently typing this on an iMac that is about 5 years old and still going strong. I won't bore you with the actual count of Apple devices in our home.

I will miss his keynote speeches and know that the spirit of Apple will live on.

Steve, you made the world a much better place.
author: Lynda
